description:
The 🦠 is on average 2-3 times smaller than the filtration capacity of the N95 masks.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The media’s gold standard mask, N95, is capable of eliminating particles that are 0.3um or larger. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The virus has a diameter of 60-140 nm (nanometers).⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Despite 120 countries mandating the use of masks.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The scientific data for it’s efficacy is ... let’s just say questionable.⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
⁣
